fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Pillow Fight: Choose two players each night. They will be prevented from performing any actions on that night.
- Sweet Dreams: If you are attacked, you will survive the attack and gain the ability to control the actions of your attacker for the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During Tuesday and Friday, your actions cannot be detected by investigative roles.
- Featherweight: You cannot be detected as a target for killing roles.
